page.title: 11Dunnington _ Children
page.content: These are some of the activities children take part in in their spare time:- watching T.V., reading, playing indoor games such as board games, badminton on the lawn, practising an instrument _ usually recorder, violin or piano, using computer and making toy models. When they play outside we found that children played:_ ball games, cars, on rope swings, bicycling, roller booting, twang, teddies dolls, skipping and tree climbing. There are also a number of organised activities in which children take part such as :- Short tennis, Cricket, Brownies, Cubs Guides and Scouts, Tennis, Squash, Jogging, Country Dancing, Parties, Soccer, Rugby, Pony Riding and Disco.
